item.trailText: The Guardian’s picture editors bring you a selection of the best photographs from around the world
item.standFirst: The Guardian’s picture editors bring you a selection of the best photographs from around the world, including the first day of Wimbledon, the cleanup at Glastonbury and perfect Australian surf

displayImages.caption:
Wimbledon, UK
Players practise on the first day of the tennis championships. Follow today’s live coverage Photograph: Stefan Wermuth/Reuters

Athens, Greece

item.title: Photo highlights of the day: from Glastonbury to Uber protests
item.trailText: Glastonbury 2015, Uber protests in France, and the conflict in Syria
item.standFirst: The Guardian’s picture editors bring you a selection of the best photographs from around the world, including Glastonbury 2015, Uber protests in France, and the conflict in Syria

Follow the latest developments here Photograph: Marko Djurica/Reuters

Adventurer Sam Cossman moves towards a huge lava lake wearing a custom-built heat suit. The Marum crater has one of only seven lava lakes on the planet. Cossman and his team used high-tech drones, virtual reality cameras and biometric wearable sensors to learn more about the geology of such an extreme environment Photograph: Sam Cossman/Barcroft Media
displayImages.altText:
Ambrym, Vanuatu
Adventurer Sam Cossman movies towards the huge lava lake wearing a custom built industrial proximity heat suit. harrowing journey into the Marum crater, which is one of only seven lava lakes on the planet. In 2014 the 33-year-old left his home in San Francisco to fulfil his dream as a digital storyteller and tech-explorer. Sam and his team used high tech drones, virtual reality cameras, and biometric wearable sensors to learn more about the geology of such an extreme environment.

displayImages.altText: A man rides a horse cart, as smoke from a fuel depot fire billows in the background. Emergency services are battling to prevent the spread of a deadly fuel depot fire outside Kiev, and three firemen were reported missing after the blaze triggered a powerful explosion. The fire burned overnight and by morning had spread to at least 16 tanks, most of them storing petrol, sending a huge pall of smoke over the area
displayImages.cleanCaption: Vasylkiv, Ukraine Smoke from a fuel depot fire outside Kiev. Emergency services are trying to prevent the spread of the fire, and three firefighters are reported missing after the blaze triggered a powerful explosion. The fire burned overnight and by morning had spread to at least 16 tanks, most of them storing petrol, sending a huge pall of smoke over the area
